title: Our Angels Await, Stories of Love from Beyond
description: After the death of her infant son, author Lora Mercado began receiving significant signs from her child from the other side. These signs were so obvious, she felt that others must be receiving signs from their loved ones as well. Over several years, she collected stories from across the globe about incredible encounters that people have had with ones dear to their heart, after they passed away. These true stories will astound you and leave you with a comforting warmth, that the ones that we love never really leave our side, and are always encouraging us along the way. This new age book is an excellent tool for self help and spiritual healing. If you have suffered the loss of a child, loss of a spouse or family member, then reading this book will bring a sense of peace to know that our loved ones in heaven continue to watch over us. *ALSO AVAILABLE IN PAPERBACK*
author: Lora C. Mercado
